ComicInfo.Title: Believe
ComicInfo.Summary: At the close of our suspense-filled last issue, it looked as though Ray Torres was finally getting his wish, he was falling to his death from the roof of his orphanage! But now, fueled by the desire to expose the corruption behind the mysterious deaths of his fellow orphans, and the stirring words of a Dark Paladin who speaks to Ray through his dreams . . . encouraging him to find the courage to become the hero is destined to be! A hero with the power to survive the fall, and fly to the rescue of the defenseless! You won't want to miss the birth and baptism of the latest super-hero creation from the legendary Jim Starlin!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 07:49:23. [CVDB209059]
